commands.name: /fill
commands.description: Replace the color selected with /getFill with the active paint color

args.name: ignoreMaterials
args.description: Ignore material of brick when filling

commands.name: /fillAll
commands.description: Replace all colors with active paint color

args.name: ignoreMaterials
args.description: Ignore material of brick when filling

commands.name: /getFill
commands.description: The color you want to replace, pull out paint tool and choose a color then type the command.

only-authorized.description: Whether only authorized players can use fill commands

authorized-users.description: List of players who can always use fill commands
